abstract: Record labels were making terrible missteps long before the advent of the digital age.
snippet: Record labels were making terrible missteps long before the advent of the digital age.
lead_paragraph: LIKE most purveyors of media, music labels are flailing about for a new business model even as their old one is quickly becoming outmoded.

headline.main: Free Music? Only With a Fight
headline.print_headline: Free Music? Only With a Fight
